text: Charles Jules Henri Nicolle (September 21, 1866 - February 28, 1936) was a French doctor and microbiologist. He won the 1928 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for his work on the disease typhus. == References == Category:1866 births Category:1936 deaths Category:French Nobel Prize winners Category:French physicians Category:French microbiologists Category:People from Rouen
title: Charles Nicolle
